sect1.title: KIWI Editor
sect1.para: You can edit the KIWI file associated to your project. It is only possible, at the moment, to edit the repository list. If you are running your own instance of OBS be sure you have the kiwi_image_editor feature enabled in your config/feature.yml file.

sect2.title: Accessing the KIWI Editor
sect2.para: Go to your package, and upload a file with the .kiwi extension (i.e. "test.kiwi"), with a valid KIWI content.

figure.title: Example of a package with a KIWI xml file

note.para: You should see now a "Edit KIWI" link (next to "Delete package" link).

sect2.para: Modify the KIWI configuration as you want, and click the "Save" button when you finish.
